text:
@NadineDorries Hey Nadine what do you think of Boris telling us to "take it on the chin"? What do you think of him refusing 1000s of ventilators offered by the EU? What do you think of him wasting weeks?

#coronavirus #Corona #COVIDー19 #BorisJohnson #ToriesOut #Brexit #dontbuythescum

entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
